eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Riverside, CA; AT 04:30 PM ON SEP 07, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:30 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
AN AMBER ALERT IS BEING ISSUED BY THE CALIFORNIA HIGHWAY PATROL ON BEHALF OF THE LOS ANGELES SHERIFFS DEPARTMENT.

ON SEPTEMBER 07 2025 AT 1200 PM ENZO ANTONESCU WAS ABDUCTED FROM CITY OF INDUSTRY, CALIFORNIA.  ENZO ANTONESCU IS A 1 YEAR OLD WHITE MALE 1 FOOT 8 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 22 POUNDS WITH BROWN HAIR AND GREEN EYES. ENZO ANTONESCU HAS AN UNKNOWN CLOTHING DESCRIPTION.

THE SUSPECT DRAGAN ANTONESCO IS A 20 YEAR OLD WHITE MALE STANDING 5 FEET 9 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 160 POUNDS WITH BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. DRAGAN ANTONESCO IS BELIEVED TO BE WEARING A BLACK SHIRT AND BLACK PANTS.

THE SUSPECT IS BELIEVED TO BE DRIVING A 2011 BLACK TOYOTA SIENNA WITH CALIFORNIA LICENSE PLATE 9SLF463

IF SEEN CALL 9 1 1
